treated_iron_end: Iron and Copper Blueprints, Common affixed stone tier gun
scguns.desc.mininggadget: High quality mining tool invented by Dr. Hefhnehll of the MREC, It's a pioneer among the mining lasers and has greatly aided resource extraction by the multinational drilling and mining company.
